@@ -631,1 +632,1 @@

+// Creates the timestamp in UTC using the ISO 8601 extended format
@@ -637,0 +638,5 @@

+    def zonedTime = ZonedDateTime.ofInstant(buildInstant, ZoneOffset.UTC)
